data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 3, Important block from the Sevilla defence as Alfonso Pedraza fires in a strike for Villarreal.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno breaks free at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
In the minute 5, Marcos Acuna (Sevilla) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sevilla have been awarded a penalty...
Juan Foyth (Villarreal) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 8, Lucas Ocampos nets and Sevilla now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
In the minute 11, Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Sevilla's area.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 14, Villarreal needs to be cautious. Sevilla have an attacking throw-in.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In Seville Sevilla attack through Diego Carlos. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Cesar Soto Grado awards Villarreal a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 19, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Villarreal's Ruben Pena gets in a shot on goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 21, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sevilla to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Villarreal push forward at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan and Gerard Moreno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sevilla defence.
In the minute 25, Can Villarreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sevilla's half?
Free kick Sevilla.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Sevilla throw-in in Villarreal's half.
In the minute 29, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sevilla defender.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Villarreal.
Throw-in high up the field for Sevilla in Seville.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In the minute 33, Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Sevilla's Diego Carlos goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Sevilla.
Fernando (Sevilla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Villarreal.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Villarreal throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 42, Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 44, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cesar Soto Grado will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 45, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Villarreal make their first substitution with Yeremi Pino replacing Juan Foyth.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Villarreal throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Villarreal drive upfield and Alfonso Pedraza gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sevilla defender.
In the minute 53, Great finish from Youssef En-Nesyri to give Sevilla a 2-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Ocampos.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla.
In Seville, Marcos Acuna of Sevilla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Sevilla are in shooting range from this free kick.
Youssef En-Nesyri (Sevilla) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Villarreal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Seville.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jesus Navas.
In the minute 61, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
In the minute 63, Jesus Navas has recovered and rejoins the match in Seville.
The home team have replaced Suso with Munir El Haddadi. This is the first substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Samuel Chukwueze is on a sub for Fer Nino for Villarreal.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Sevilla.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Cesar Soto Grado awards Sevilla a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Sevilla.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Sevilla throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 70, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Free kick Villarreal.
Munir El Haddadi for Sevilla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Cesar Soto Grado awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Alfonso Pedraza for Villarreal drives towards goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Samuel Chukwueze (Villarreal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Villarreal's Alfonso Pedraza is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 76, Manu Trigueros is booked for the away team.
The home team replace Ivan Rakitic with Oliver Torres.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Unai Emery is making the team's third substitution at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan with Carlos Bacca replacing Manu Trigueros.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Throw-in Sevilla.
In the minute 87, Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 88, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dani Parejo (Villarreal) has received a first yellow card.
Nemanja Gudelj is replacing Joan Jordan for the home team.
Luuk De Jong is replacing Youssef En-Nesyri for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In Seville, Nemanja Gudelj of Sevilla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Carlos Bacca for Villarreal has been booked by Cesar Soto Grado and receives a first yellow card.
